item.description:
For informational purposes "Friend" just ask to post this if enough interest will try to head down myself after work!! 

Come on out Thursday, October 4th for a fun filled evening with all the music you love to dance to and
all the dances you love to dance! Michelle will be teaching & DJ'ing all night
Doors open @ 7:00 pm
Dance Lesson from 7:30 - 8:30

Open dancing (including)
2-Step, West Coast Swing, Line & Partner pattern to your requests until 10:30 pm

Cover ... $10.00 per person ... OR ... $8.00 per person wearing a cowboy hat ;~)

Michelle's intention is for everyone to dance their butts off with new & old friends

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Country Dancing w/Michelle Thursday@RRain
